cast.overview: Seoul, South Korea, 1997. When the young but extremely anxious student Jin-seok, his parents and his successful older brother Yoo-seok move to a new home, mysterious and frightening events begin to happen around them, unexplained events that threaten to ruin their seemingly happy lives. Unable to understand what is happening, Jin-seok wonders if he is losing his mind.
cast.title: Forgotten

details.biography: Jeong Taek-hyeon is a former member of the Korean boy band group 1THE9. He was a contestant in MBC's survival show, Under19 (Under Nineteen). He ranked 5th position in the survival show and became a member of boy group 1THE9 for 17 months. He debuted in 2009 as a child actor, he first appeared on Waiting For My Mom.
details.name: Jeong Taek-hyeon
